comment: The set of closed walks of fixed length ` N ` in a simple graph ` G ` is the union of the closed walks of the fixed length ` N ` on each of the vertices of graph ` G ` . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Oct-2018.) (Revised by AV, 28-May-2021.) (Revised by AV, 3-Mar-2022.) (Proof shortened by AV, 28-Mar-2022.)
